description:
A thief helps a sick boy instead of stealing. 
A horse, a cat, a dog, and a chicken go on a journey.
Stories are sold for ten gold coins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dorobou no Son / Uma to Inu to Neko to Niwatori no Tabi / Hanashi Juuryou
The Thief`s Loss / The Horse, Dog, Cat, and Chicken Go on a Journey / Stories for Ten Coins
泥棒の損 / 馬と犬と猫と鶏の旅 / 話十両
